item.description:
Interested in Sex on the Charles? The drink of course...its on Rattlesnake's beverage menu in addition to a variety of beer.

If you're hungry for food, check out Rattlesnake's appetizer, dinner, & dessert menu. I've enjoyed the tortilla soup, fish tacos and chicken quesadilla.

Get there when you can. I'll arrive at 5 and hang until 7.....unless????

Be prepared to be flattered.....you'll be carded as you enter, so have your identification ready.

The first new member who finds me (will be wearing bright green velvet top), gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Arlington (green line) is closest, less than (five (5) minute walk) subway station. Chinatown (orange line) subway station is less than a fifteen (15) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: At the bar on the roof
item.name: Southwestern Style Happy Hour at The Rattlesnake
